title: unnaruL illAmal
sahitya:
unnaruL illAmal uyvaghai EdayyA umai taru vaDivEl Ongiya kaiyA


anupallavi

  panniru vizhigaLAl pArtt-ulagaLittiDum ennuyir amudamE ezhil shuDar vaDivamE


caraNam    iRultanil Unrukol izhanda kuruTTUman pOl EnginEn murugA iduvun tiruvuLLamO
shuruL alai tavazhndiDum tUya tiruk-kuLangaL shUzhnda narp-pazhaniyil tOnriya kumaranE
